books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: Shortly after Saint Ambrose Prep goes co-ed, a student is attacked and the community falls apart.
books.name: MORAL COMPASS

books.author: by Ann Napolitano
books.description: A 12-year-old boy tries to start over after becoming the sole survivor of a plane crash in which he lost his immediate family.
books.name: DEAR EDWARD

books.author: by Andrzej Sapkowski
books.description: Linked stories follow the exploits of Geralt of Rivia, a monster-slaying mercenary.
books.name: THE LAST WISH

books.author: by Stuart Woods
books.description: The 52nd book in the Stone Barrington series. Stone is asked to expose a double agent in the State Department.
books.name: TREASON

books.author: by Jayne Ann Krentz
books.description: A killer goes after a pair of Seattle investigators who witnessed a murder 15 years ago in the secretive town of Fogg Lake.
books.name: THE VANISHING

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: Cullen Post, a lawyer and Episcopal minister, antagonizes some ruthless killers when he takes on a wrongful conviction case.
books.name: THE GUARDIANS

books.author: by Brad Taylor
books.description: The 14th book in the Pike Logan series. Pike has a hunch Taskforce is being targeted.
books.name: HUNTER KILLER

books.author: by Kiley Reid
books.description: Tumult ensues when Alix Chamberlain’s babysitter is mistakenly accused of kidnapping her charge.
books.name: SUCH A FUN AGE

books.author: by Liz Moore
books.description: Mickey risks her job with the Philadelphia police force by going after a murderer and searching for her missing sister.
books.name: LONG BRIGHT RIVER

books.author: by Alex Michaelides
books.description: Theo Faber looks into the mystery of a famous painter who stops speaking after shooting her husband.
books.name: THE SILENT PATIENT

books.author: by Ann Patchett
books.description: A sibling relationship is impacted when the family goes from poverty to wealth and back again over the course of many decades.
books.name: THE DUTCH HOUSE

books.author: by Jojo Moyes
books.description: In Depression-era Kentucky, five women refuse to be cowed by men or convention as they deliver books.
books.name: THE GIVER OF STARS

books.author: by Robyn Carr
books.description: The fifth book in the Sullivan's Crossing series.
books.name: THE COUNTRY GUESTHOUSE

books.author: by Tarryn Fisher
books.description: A woman discovers something disturbing about her polygamist husband.
books.name: THE WIVES
